FIELD.NAME: CONTENT-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message content description

FIELD.NAME: MSG-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique ID used by the requestor or publisher to distinguish the message

FIELD.NAME: ACTION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the desired action to perform on the telemetry data stream. (1: Start, 2: Stop, 3: Pause, 4: Continue, 5: Step)

FIELD.NAME: STREAM-MODE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the type of data to be published. (RT: Real Time, RPY: Replay/Playback, SIM: Simulator, TEST: Test/Data Generator)

FIELD.NAME: PLAYBACK-RATIO
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Speed of playback as a ratio of playback rate to real-time rate. This is the default method; default = 1. > 0 and < 1 is slower than real-time rate = 1 is equal to the real-time rate > 1 is faster than real-time rate

FIELD.NAME: DATA-RATE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Data rate in Kilobits per second. Value in the range of > 0.

FIELD.NAME: START-TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time (absolute or relative) of first telemetry data. Defaults to the start of the archive

FIELD.NAME: STOP-TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time of last telemetry data. Defaults to the end of the archive

FIELD.NAME: ORBIT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Orbit or revolution number of the vehicle (past or future). Value in the range of 0+.

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-FILES
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of Telemetry files to replay. Value in the range of 1+.

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-START
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the start of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-END
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the end of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: FORMAT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Telemetry Message types to playback. Note: A provider may not capable of providing all types, e.g. only raw or only processed data (ALL: All message types, CCSDSPKT: CCSDS packets, CCSDSFRAME: CCSDS frames, TDM: TDM frames, PROCESSED: Converted TLM)

FIELD.NAME: COLLECTION-POINT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Receiver, device, point, path, etc. where data was received. Used to distinguish data simultaneously received at multiple collection points.

FIELD.NAME: STREAM-MODE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the type of data to be published. (RT: Real Time, RPY: Replay/Playback, SIM: Simulator, TEST: Test/Data Generator)

FIELD.NAME: VCID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Virtual Channel IDs: comma delimited channel IDs with '-' for channel ID ranges. Example: 1,2,6-9,10

FIELD.NAME: APID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: AP IDs: comma delimited AP IDs with '-' for channel ID ranges. Example: 1,2,6-9,10
